Others: CJ McCollum, Brandon Ingram, and Jordan Hawkins are off to a quality start on their long-range attempts, but the other Pelicans are struggling with three-point shooting.
Yves Missi, a developing 20-year-old, is averaging 8.5 points per game, which is unexpected for his statistics.
Golden State Warriors reserves contributed significantly to their 18-point victory over New Orleans, with Lindy Waters and Jonathan Kuminga scoring 21 and 17 points, respectively.
Steph Curry did not lead his club in points in any game so far, with Buddy Hield and Andrew Wiggins holding scoring honors.
